articles.description: Latest Derby County news from Derbyshire Live brings you what a former Ram has said about the club in the build-up to the FA Cup tie at Torquay this weekend
articles.content:
Former Derby County defender Dean Moxey is relishing the chance to face his old club with Torquay United this weekend and says it's "nice" to see the Rams over their financial crisis.
